english.segment1: I need your breath to stay alive and make me feel this way. And I need your eyes to look inside and watch how we collide
english.segment2: One more time around and I don't think I'll be allowed. It's the time to tell you
english.segment3: Take me, make me, break. Watch me get wicked and drop like a hand grenade. Take me, make me, break. Watch me get wicked and drop like a hand grenade
english.segment4: What's up is comin' down. And I hope no one's around when it falls
english.segment5: I find it hard to take, sometimes I feel like I could break. And I hope you hear my prayer tonight. Can you hear my cries?
english.segment6: Take me, make me, break. Watch me get wicked like a hand grenade. Take me, make me, break. Watch me get wicked and drop like a hand grenade
english.segment7: Hey you, tell me what you want me to do. Explode like a hand grenade. Hey man, telll me what you want me to say. I'll drop like a hand grenade. Hey!
